name: Driving Across
description:
In high-school, they were an inseparable trio. Now years later, two of these lapsed friends road trip across Australia to attend the funeral of the third.

Driving Across explores the contours of grief. From the back seat of an unreliable '91 Barina, the player guides Hayley and Pip through the awkwardness that emerges when old friendships are stretched to breaking point.
